p: Frozen leaf tissues and buds were ground with a mortar in 750 μl extraction buffer and processed further as described previously [ 29]. Quantitative reverse transcription-PCR (qRT-PCR) analyses were performed with the ABI Prism 7500 Fast sequence detection system, using SYBR Green PCR master mix (Applied Biosystems). Transcript levels were normalized with Populus actin. Gene-specific primer sequences are listed in Additional file 1: Table S2.
